languages.text: "Я призываю к спасению. Не совершайте ошибки своего наставника — не пытайтесь мне препятствовать. Лорд-инквизитор действовал издалека, у вас нет такой защиты".
"I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."
languages.original_text: "Я призываю к спасению. Не совершайте ошибки своего наставника — не пытайтесь мне препятствовать. Лорд-инквизитор действовал издалека, у вас нет такой защиты".

traits.locale_text: "I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."
"I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."
"I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."
"I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."

languages.text: “我在寻求救赎。不要试图阻碍我，再次犯下你的导师犯下的错误。那个时候，大审判官躲得远远的，但你现在就在我身边。”
languages.original_text: "I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."

traits.locale_text: “我在寻求救赎。不要试图阻碍我，再次犯下你的导师犯下的错误。那个时候，审判长躲得远远的，但你现在就在我身边。”

languages.text: « Au contraire, je cherche le salut. Ne reproduisez pas l'erreur de votre mentor. Ne cherchez pas à me barrer la route. Car si le seigneur inquisiteur est hors de ma portée, ce n'est pas votre cas. »
languages.original_text: "I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."

traits.locale_text: « Au contraire, je cherche le salut. Ne reproduisez pas l'erreur de votre mentor. Ne cherchez pas à me barrer la route. Car si le seigneur inquisiteur est hors de ma portée, ce n'est pas votre cas. »

languages.text: «Estoy proclamando la salvación. No repita el error de su predecesor intentando obstruir mi camino. El Lord Inquisidor actuaba desde lejos... usted no tendrá esa protección».
languages.original_text: "I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy proclamando la salvación. No repita el error de su predecesor intentando obstruir mi camino. El Lord Inquisidor actuaba desde lejos... usted no tendrá esa protección».

languages.text: 「私が求めているのは救済である。あなたの師と同じ過ちを犯し、私の邪魔をしようとするな。ロード・インクィジターは遠く離れていたが…あなたにそのような加護はない」
languages.original_text: "I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."

traits.locale_text: 「私が求めているのは救済である。あなたの師と同じ過ちを犯し、私の邪魔をしようとするな。ロード・インクィジターは遠く離れていたが…あなたにそのような加護はない」

languages.text: "Ich fordere Erlösung. Begeht nicht den Fehler Eures Mentors und versucht, Euch mir in den Weg zu stellen. Der Großinquisitor hat aus der Ferne agiert — Ihr habt keinen solchen Schutz."
languages.original_text: "I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fordere Erlösung. Begeht nicht den Fehler Eures Mentors und versucht, Euch mir in den Weg zu stellen. Der Großinquisitor hat aus der Ferne agiert — Ihr habt keinen solchen Schutz."

languages.original_text: "I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."

languages.text: "Kurtuluşu çağırıyorum. Yönderinin hatasına düşüp beni engellemeye çalışma. Lord Engizisyoncu uzaktan müdahale etmişti, senin mesafe gibi bir koruman da yok."
languages.original_text: "I am calling for salvation. Do not make your mentor's mistake and try to obstruct me. The Lord Inquisitor acted from afar — you have no such protection."

traits.locale_text: "Kurtuluşu çağırıyorum. Yönderinin hatasına düşüp beni engellemeye çalışma. Lord Engizisyoncu uzaktan müdahale etmişti, senin öyle bir siperin yok."
